replies.body: Is there a reason missions have dates instead of just popping up after you complete others now? It's rather annoying to have to wait for the month to be half over before I can grab what I want and be done with it.

To get people to play more over the month and make them use their time less efficiently. If you could get all the quests up front you would know exactly how much you need to grind for the prestige skin, could get it, then dip out for the month. However, Riot are no longer a player friendly company and are more interested in making it a painful grind stretched artificially over an entire month where you technically could do the math in advance but no one wants to, so they just grind endlessly to get the damn thing even though they'll likely spend more time than they have to after the extra quests come in.

Riot feels entitled to like 80% of your free time for an entire month just to get the skin, and not only that but they won't let you finish all the quests up front to accurately gauge how long it'll take. If you spend more time on the game, you'll probably spend more money.

> [{quoted}](name=NotDTOPuRLkn4,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gW5KiXre,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-08-01T23:53:47.221+0000)

> Umm why can't I get PROJECT: Irelia Prestige Edition?  It's not showing up in the Prestige Points 2019 area...

because it's not prestige points skin,its PROJECT tokens skin.click on the tokens,and there she is

> [{quoted}](name=PhoneRIngPink,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gW5KiXre,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2019-08-02T01:31:11.035+0000)
>
> because it's not prestige points skin,its PROJECT tokens skin.click on the tokens,and there she is

It clearly says Project Irelia: Prestige Edition.  Prestige Point Shop says Forege your Prestige Points into exclusive 2019 Prestige Edition skins. The skin currently there are  Blood Moon Aatrox Prestige Edition, or K/DA Evelynn Prestige Edition.  It's a project token skin AND a prestige skin.  Note that there is a REGULAR Project Irelia skin.

Also note the naming convention.  It's the same like the other ones in the shop.

It is not an Exclusive 2019 Prestige Edition skin, it is an event exclusive prestige skin like KDA Akali pe(prestige edition), Firecracker Vayne pe, and most recently Arcade Caitlyn pe. The ones you buy with (2019) prestige points are available for purchase the full year(2019), while event exclusive prestige skins are available only during their events for their respective event tokens. All prestige skins share naming conventions, but the ones available for prestige points are the prestige skins that did not come out with a token event.

A sidenote is the original replyee stated that it was a project tokens skin rather than a prestige point skin, not that it wasn't a prestige skin.

how many tokens do we get from every loss/win on aram, tft, etc?

Probably the same as usual:
Summoner's Rift win: 12, loss: 6
Aram win: 8, loss: 4
TFT (you have to play at least 10m which is also when you can ff) win (top 4): 6, loss (last 4): 3 

There is no token gain from Twisted Treeline yet and you can't earn tokens from bot games either.
so if you sit AFK in TFT you can just farm 3 tokens every loss slowly building a stockpile while you do other things on your computer?
Basically yeah. That's what I did for the arcade event.
